description:
The MerinoFine™ Interlock Pants are classic chino-style pants made with 15.5 micron, 100% pure merino wool fibers for a luxuriously soft feel that’s naturally breathable and odor resistant. The versatile pants feature an elastic, belt-loop waist with a Corozo button closure as well as back welt zippered pockets to keep your essentials secure.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker MerinoFine Interlock Pants - Mens
